00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include <l4/sys/ipc-invoke.h>
00026 # define L4_SYSCALL_cap_stats           "int $0x31 \n\t"
00027 # define L4_SYSCALL_debugger            "int $0x32 \n\t"
00028 #ifndef L4_SYSCALL
00029 # define L4_SYSCALL(name)                 L4_SYSCALL_ ## name  ///< syscall entry
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 
00033 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00034 l4_invoke_debugger(l4_cap_idx_t obj, l4_msgtag_t tag, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00035 {
00036   l4_umword_t dummy1, dummy2;
00037 
00038   __asm__ __volatile__(
00039   L4_SYSCALL(debugger)
00040        :
00041   "=d" (dummy1),
00042   "=a" (tag.raw),
00043   "=D" (dummy2)
00044        :
00045   "d" (obj),
00046   "a" (tag.raw),
00047   "D" (utcb)
00048        :
00049   "memory", "cc"
00050        );
00051 
00052   return tag;
00053 }
